name: MAPagerViewController
summary: MAPagerViewController is a top tab pager to scroll tabs/tap with screen.
description: 'MAPagerViewController is a  top tab pager for seamless navigation between different tabs. Boasting a user-friendly interface, it enables effortless tab scrolling and tapping, enhancing the overall user experience. This library empowers developers allowing users to effortlessly switch between different tabs.  Elevate your app navigation with Pager-iOS, simplifying tab interaction and elevating user satisfaction.'
